trait.name: Chimeric Creation
entries: The fox has fur that changes color to match its surroundings, giving it advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage.
